name: Safe clean quiet convenient Family neighborhood :)
neighborhood_overview: Everything you need is within walking distance
description:
This is a nice apartment building 15 minutes from downtown (from your front door total commute) Boston 12 minutes from Fenway Longwood medical area five minutes from BMC Hospital this is a safe quiet area it will be 3 sharing the unit and I need the right people I need responsible working adults that act like responsible adults and respect each other space please don’t just write I need a room,tell me everything about your situation yourself and why you were looking for housing Thank you

The space
Huge three bedroom apartment three minute walk to major transit 15 minutes total commute to downtown Boston

Guest access
Nice little backyard in a city environment but semi private

Other things to note
There was laundry one block away MBTA is literally 200 yards away pubs grocery store shops cafés or within two blocks of where you live it is a great safe quiet clean neighborhood I raised my family here and I have no intentio
